thread.section_title: DesignCrowd Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DesignCrowd | designcrowd.com
thread.title: A/R

author: A/R
title: A/R
text:
Thank you so much for answering the phone!
We ordered 2 projects. Didn't know what to expect, but delighfully surprised how organized and involved you maintain DesignCrowd.
We thought we might get an awful recording, or deal with long hold times, etc. But that didn't happen.
You answered, listened to our questions and concerns and immediately handled the requests at hand.
Know it wasn't you that applied for the designers to add that "extra fee for requesting them" when we never did. Thank you for taking care of that as well. All around FABULOUS service you provide.
It really could not have been easier, more simplified and successful.
Thank you again for making it so easy to reach so many talented people from all over the world, obtain 2 projects we are really proud of.
